name: FireLine: Merge Defense
description:
Fireline is a super addictive Tower Defense game that allows you to Merge Cannon to defeat the Cube army rush!

Unlock a variety of cannon in your arsenal. Merge to upgrade the cannon and position tactically to defend against increasingly powerful waves of cubes and deadly bosses.

Regardless whether you are a merge fan or tower defense veterans, Fireline will provide a familiar yet fresh and exciting experience!
